text: The Hershey Company (), until April 2005 Hershey Foods Corporation,Preparedfoods.com URL last accessed June 30, 2006. commonly called Hershey's, is America's largest chocolate company.Booksense.com URL last accessed June 30 2006. Its main office is in Hershey, Pennsylvania, a town that smells strongly of cocoa on some days,CNN News Article URL last accessed January 3 2007. and home to Hershey's Chocolate World. The company was founded by Milton S. Hershey in 1894 as the Hershey Chocolate Company. Hershey's candies and other products are sold around the world. Popular Hershey candy is Hershey milk chocolate, Reese's, KitKat, Hershey kisses, Twizzlers, Jolly Rancher, Icebreakers gum, Payday, and Dot's pretzels. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Companies based in Pennsylvania Category:1894 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: The Hershey Company
